attributes.action: enforce compulsory priority to people that are disabled, pregnant or carying small children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some companies, such as low fare airlines, don't have any kind of priority for pregnant or disable people or small children. Some times they even charge extra for priority.

Priority for those groups is not a matter of price, it's a matter of respect! If the government don't enforce a compulsory priority, those companies will continue on their own rules and new companies will feel compelled to follow the same rules to reduce costs and increase profit.

This kind of profit should be considered an offence!
